Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between O'hare and Addison
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'hare and Addison due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare bound Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Addison due to track conditions.

As a result, O'Hare bound Blue Line trains are operating only between Addison and Forest Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between O'Hare and Addison to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
